name: Kathmandu Tandoori House
review:
Great option for Indian and nepali food. The chicken momos were excellent and the sauce that comes with them was stellar. 
Chicken biryani was also good,.... What a wonderful surprise to be in a neighborhood near the Madrid neighborhood & to find excellent India/Nepali food! Very delicious with attentive service.. I had the tikka masala and tandoori chicken.  Both were very very good!  The host was very nice and helpful. It's a quiet neighborhood restaurant with....

name: La General
review:
Man,  even when looking for good eats internationally Yelpers come to the rescue 

Was on a layover awaiting a flight home from Madrid's Barajas airport and.... Great option when in transit close to Madrid Barajas airport. Food was good, service was friendly and price was reasonable. 
We had a party of 7, and.... What a great little spot almost right across the street from the Ibis Hotel Barajas. I had the mango curry chicken at my server's recommendation and it was....

name: Al Traste Fun And Food
review:
For me the best place in the area. 
Really good meat and very good service. 
Nice beers. 
Go for the grilled meat!
Also with extended hours which is very.... We were staying in a cheap hotel up the street and were flying out or Madrid airport the next day. This was close to the hotel so we decided to give it a.... On the last night of a two week holiday in Spain we checked into a typical airport area hotel and ventured out for one last dinner in Madrid. We slid Into....

name: La Torino
review: I've eaten here twice while in Bajaras.  The first time I had the stuffed sea bass which was amazing.  The second time I had  the mixed salad and oxtail.... I loved this place! I had a few hour layovers in Madrid. It's about a 9 minute Uber ride from the airport. So if you have a bit of time between flights it's.... Loved this place! We had an unremarkable dinner and were looking for somewhere to celebrate the end of our 10 days in Spain. The staff were so friendly and....

name: Campanilla
review: Nos quedamos una noche en Barajas  y encontramos este pequeño restaurante familiar a través de Yelp. Fue una experiencia inolvidable! La comida fue.... This was our last night in Spain. We needed a meal within walking distance from the airport hotel. We did not expect to have the most memorable of our.... Such a great experience.  I am from Louisville, KY - the food was great.  Great wine.  Very authentic!  Would absolutely go back..

name: Asador Nuevo Porche
review: All things are perfect. Food is fantastic. The boss is kindly and friendly. Wine is tasted smoothy and also more beer. Quite a good representative of the traditional "asador" (rosters) tradition in Spain. Impressive interior reproducing a Basque vernacular farm house. With.... We had an amazing time. Food was excellent and the service was tremendous. Our server was very helpful and even the owner attended us. If you want a good....

name: Bahía Taberna
address: Calle de la Bahía de Palma, 9, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review:
OMG!! 
I stopped in for a glass of wine. I'm vegan and figured they didn't gave anything but asked if they could make a salad. Wow wow wow!! The chef made.... Absolutely delicious food! Perfect pit stop on the way to the airport, residential location therefore it's very quiet. Great selection of beers, there's.... Suprise! Suprise! You may think that what in the world this restaurant is doing in this part of city. And you are right, there is no explanation. In any....

name: La Latina
review:
This is a nice little charming restaurant in Barajas.  I was really happy with the quality of the food and how flavorful it was.  I walked by the night.... In the Madrid airport area for one evening ahead of a flight the next day and staying down the street at the Clement Barajes Hotel.

On a Saturday night, I.... A great place for lunch! A delicious salad, a main course, a bottle of pineapple juice and a tasty pudding only cost me 10 euros altogether. Their dishes....

name: La Vina de Nerea
review: Very friendly and casual.  Quick service. Nice wine selection at reasonable prices and excellent tapas. A great place to unwind after a busy day of.... Outstanding tapas. I let the wait staff choose as I could not make out one from another. Must try the croquette, Spanish ham and a fish pâté. Try the house.... Was staying in nearby airport hotel for flight out next day. About a ten minute walk from TRYP Hotel is this lovely restaurant. Actually two restaurants in....

name: Martes 13
review: This isn't just a casual five stars.  Completely legit.  Stunningly ridiculous.  Do not pass on the artichokes.  Best I've ever had..

name: El Txoko de Ander
review: When you don't speak a language, ordering can be fun!  But they do have an English menu here.  This place seems to be one of three( I don't know) but we ate.... While in town for a short time and with my wife feeling unwell, I sought out a place to order carry out. We discovered El Txoko, and studied the menu for a.... This place has restored my faith in humanity. After an absolute nightmare of a day, with an historic snowfall in Madrid and the subsequent closure of Madrid....

name: La Caprichosa
address: Plaza Hermanos Falcó y Álvarez de Toledo, 21, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: We didn't expect much from this unassuming taverna, but we were pleasantly surprised! Great service, fabulous food, and a pleasant atmosphere. We would go....

name: Sienna
review: Ordered the medium sized pizza. It was clearly frozen, bought in a supermarket. Took a bite. Complained and left..

name: Tuk Tuk
review:
A great visit

Our trip to Spain is ending.  As I sit on our plane flying home to the US, getting caught up on Yelp reviews, it's nice thinking back to the.... Spent one night near the Barajas airport on my way back to NYC. This place was close and even if I wanted Spanish food for my last night, I decided to come....

name: Mas Q Menos
address: Aeropuerto de Madrid-Barajas, Terminal 4, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: I've been to Madrid's airport countless times, and this is my go-to café every time I pass through Terminal 4S. They have a decent coffee and a good.... I'm not saying it's the best place on earth, it's just one of the most solid restaurants within the airport. Definitely, one of like three places with.... For an airport restaurant, this place was the best! I ordered off a touch screen (which was very convenient and quick) and I got a couple items, thinking....

name: Casa Nemesia
address: Plaza Mayor de Barajas, 12, 28042 Madrid, Spain

name: Dreams
address: Calle Canal de Suez, 7, 28042 Madrid, Spain

name: La Consentida
review: On my final night in Madrid, I moved to a hotel closer to the airport so I would not have any commute issues in the am. I walked around the area looking for.... The food was good but the service left some to be desired. We were a group of four people and told our server at the beginning that we wanted separate....

name: Martinuka
address: Plaza Mayor de Barajas, 12, 28042 Madrid, Spain

name: Hostal EL Principe Plaza Hermanos Falco, 4
address: Plaza Hermanos Falco y Alvarez de Toledo, 8, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: Can't speak for the lodging, but we ate in the restaurant and ordered the ternero menu for two. It included a 2.75" t-bone with fries, green salad, a half.... It says this is a hostel and it is but they have an awesome restaurant. We ordered paella for two (28 Euro). We had a glass of the house red rioja wine.....

name: 100 Montaditos
address: Avenida de la Hispanidad, s/n, Terminal T2, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review:
The name of the restaurant is an exact description of the menu! 100 Montaditos offers a menu of 100 bite-sized sandwiches (bocadillos) with various fillings.... Located near D61 in true Madrid airport. I'm giving this restaurant 5 stars because what more can you ask for? Super cheap, warm and fresh sandwiches. 

I.... I've had 100 Montaditos in NYC. It wasn't until I showed up in Spain did I realize that it's actually a Spanish chain. Makes sense though.

So when I saw....

name: Mesón Don Fernando
address: Calle del Canal de Suez, 1, Barajas, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: Very average. Saw a bunch of locals seated outside. Wait staff was very helpful. Had the croquettes and spicy potatoes. Both were unspectacular. For a few.... Very helpful staff, very friendly place. Had drinks and dinner for four for 35 euros..

name: No Q No
address: Calle Bahía de Palma, 7, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: We had one night in Madrid prior to flying back home and found this gem through a little searching. Our hotel was near airport which meant our options were....

name: La Bekada
review: Great service, and even better food. My family and I were staying at a hotel in the vicinity, and La Bekada stood out among the options nearby. Although we.... Able to accommodate us gringos on a late Sunday night close to airport.  Paella was large in size, but tasty.  Good option for this part of town.  Sangria.... I would not consider this spot a steak house but the food was good for a reasonable price. The Burgers and the appetizers appeared more appealing than the....

name: Derzu
address: Calle Bahía de Palma, 4, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: #madrid #spain Pretty amazing creative Asian food in Madrid. All the server was pretty nice and gentle and our dishes were flawless..

name: Mcdonalds
review:
Loved this McDonald's! Open air dining and service was prompt. 

If you happen to be staying at the Melia Barajas, it is footsteps away..

name: Don Fernando
address: Calle Canal de Suez, 1, 28042 Madrid, Spain

name: Sushi & Buey
review: While service was good, the food was sub par compared to real Japanese food.  The rice tasted like the ones you can get at supermarkets where I am from.... Ok so trip advisor said that this place was good so we tried it. The food actually made me sick! The fish was not good and the rice was very over cooked. I.... Their sashimi was served at room temperature and the tuna was actually grey. I got sick and finally had to get antibiotics. Great way to start a vacation..

name: Lizarran
address: Plaza Hermanos Falco y Álvarez de Toledo, 10, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review:
So so - small predictable tapas without any extra special flair. It is ok but if you have little time (as I did) - perhaps try somewhere else.
I had heard.... We gave this one star because the staff were very friendly but the food was not fresh or good. We've been in Spain for 3 weeks and this was our only poor....

name: Burger King
address: Avenida de la Hispanidad, s/n, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: What a satisfying stop for a snack between flights! I got the waffle with ice cream, and I was very pleasantly surprised. Maybe in the US, things are just.... Perhaps what you'd expect from an airport Burger King, but the onion rings were a massive disappointment. I sunk my teeth into my highly anticipated onion....

name: Bar Madrid
review: Not really sure where to start with the review. It's super close to downtown. The people are amazingly friendly, the drinks are great, the food is good.....

name: La Mary
address: Aeropuerto Madrid Barajas, Terminal 4, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: This is about the best I can do with scoring this place! To start I had the oxtail croquettes. They were different yet not to bad. The portion size was good.... The service is awful. I had the younger waiter who was such a jerk to everyone in his area. No eye contact, really short, didn't have time for anyone. The.... For a place to get a bite at an airport, they are even more expensive than usual airport prices.  The service was so-so at best.  My wife and I both had....

name: La Fontana
address: Calle Bahía de Palma, 9, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: This is a gem like others you can find in quiet neighborhoods in Spain. Owners are there. And the crew are like family. Honest food. Fair prices. Delectable....

name: Enrique Tomas
address: Av de la Hispanidad, s/n, Terminal T4, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review:
That Serrano ham
Was to die for!!! The baguette was good but a little bit to hard, at least to me. 

Is not a cheap sandwich but the nice presentation and.... My favourite spot at the Madrid airport! So good as a pre-flight meal and great place to pick up amazing Iberico ham for home.. Nixon has been excellent person in attentive person the food quality is over excellent for a airport Enrique Tomas meet a great 5 start criteria..

name: Urban Grill
address: Adolfo Suarez Madrid Aeroporto, Place Terminal T2., Madrid, Spain
review:
Madrid was a stopover and I had gotten there at around 8am. I wasn't impressed with this particular airport as there wasn't enough variety in food. My.... This is probably as good as airport food can get. And it's a pretty good deal too!

For less than 20 euros (I can't remember exactly how much), you can get.... Airport dining is typically hit or miss.  Terminal 1 at this airport has limited dining choices especially when you consider places like O'Hare or JFk.  My....

name: Cafetería El Cuervo
review: When I write a review I first consider the fact that reviews can impact someone's livelihood and I write with the public's interest in mind. That....

name: Starbucks
review:
Open 24 hours for your every need while stranded in the Madrid-Barajas airport.  The menu is the same as back home - so there's no problem with deciding.... One of the employees, Maika, is very rude and unprofessional. I saw her treating customers poorly before me.   She was so rude with me that I has to ask why.... Horrible service.
Long wait.
Mistakes in coffee prep.

I know Starbucks can do better than that!
Hope they will guide the team there how to operate the....

name: Essenza by Sha
description: Juice Bars & Smoothies Food Stands Health Markets
address: Aeropuerto Adolfo Suárez Madrid Barajas Terminal 4 SAT, Avenida de la Hispanidad, s/n, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: So I'm not a big fan of the airport in Madrid. Stopped here by way of Sevilla to Philadelphia. You can't miss Essenza as it is one of the few eating options....

name: Eating Point
address: Aeropuerto de Madrid Barajas T2, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review: Food is not bad. The worth thing to observe is the payment system/buzzer.  Pretty sleek, but at the end - someone needs to add a buck of paper slips, stamp....

name: McDonald's
address: Aeropuerto de Barajas, Terminal 4, 28042 Madrid, Spain
review:
Quick service and very reasonable pricing. Got 2 egg breakfast platters with drink and fruit side for under 8€! 

Considering it's an airport, that was a....
